category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 22 (Purpose and Installation)
contents: Article 22 (Purpose and Establishment) The Games Organizing Committee aims to hold a successful comprehensive sports competition, and the venue that hosts the National Sports Competition, etc. is the National Sports Competition Organizing Committee, the National Boys Sports Competition Organizing Committee, and the National Sports Festival Organizing Committee. Must be installed. However, the National Boys' Sports Festival Organizing Committee can succeed the National Sports Festival Organizing Committee, and the National Life Sports Festival Organizing Committee can succeed the National Boys' Sports Festival Organizing Committee. Revised 2023. 3. 23.
